body_html: It sounds like option 1 is better, but, it basically means that the xla_cpu_parallel doesn't work on ppc64le. That's the root cause that should be fixed, ideally. I don't see why (in theory) this shouldn't work on ppc64le.
body_text: It sounds like option 1 is better, but, it basically means that the xla_cpu_parallel doesn't work on ppc64le. That's the root cause that should be fixed, ideally. I don't see why (in theory) this shouldn't work on ppc64le.
body: It sounds like option 1 is better, but, it basically means that the `xla_cpu_parallel` doesn't work on ppc64le. That's the root cause that should be fixed, ideally. I don't see why (in theory) this shouldn't work on ppc64le.
